definition: abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
abbr. for the Philippines 菲律賓|菲律宾[Fei1 lu:4 bin1]

sentences.english: It's built in the nineteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 埃菲爾鐵塔始建於十九世紀。

sentences.english: Or, for that matter, the Eiffel Tower.
sentences.chinese: 或者是嫁給埃菲爾鐵塔。

sentences.english: The Eiffel Tower at sunset from the Sacre-Coeur Basilica.
sentences.chinese: 在聖心大教堂上欣賞暮色中的埃菲爾鐵塔。

sentences.english: The Eiffel Tower was erected in 1889.
This is Eiffel Tower. I know it.
sentences.chinese: 這是埃菲爾鐵塔，我知道。

sentences.english: The Eiffel Tower was built for Universal Exhibition 1889 Parise France.
sentences.chinese: 埃菲爾鐵塔是1889年法巴黎世博會建造的建築物。

sentences.english: The Eiffel Tower and the Hotel des Invalides are illuminated at dusk with in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎的埃菲爾鐵塔和榮平易近院在夜幕中光耀精明。

sentences.english: For a time, from the Eiffel Tower caused a storm swept across the city of Paris.
sentences.chinese: 一時間，由埃菲爾鐵塔引起的風波席捲了整個巴黎城。

sentences.english: Let's do Eiffel Tower today and the Pompidou Center tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 咱們今天去參觀埃菲爾鐵塔，明天遊覽逢皮杜中心。

sentences.english: The Eiffel Tower can be seen from any window of any building in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 在法國，任何建築的任何窗子都能看見埃菲爾鐵塔。

sentences.english: in which we infer the Eiffel Tower from its surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 我們根據埃菲爾鐵塔周圍的環境來推斷它是有意義的。

sentences.english: Under the EiffelTower, we only go to restaurants to eat, we eat very incense.
sentences.chinese: 下了埃菲爾鐵塔，我們纔去餐館喫飯，我們喫得很香。

sentences.english: Eiffel Tower does not affect the status of architectural history in the world.
sentences.chinese: 但這並不影響埃菲爾鐵塔在世界建築史上的地位。

sentences.english: And now there is an Eiffel Tower of their own in Paris!
sentences.chinese: 而如今那裏也有一座屬於它們自己的埃菲爾鐵塔。

definition: to go sightseeing/to spend one's leisure time wandering around
a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC
Kai Tak Airport, international airport of Hong Kong from 1925 to 1998
Angkor Wat, temple complex in Cambodia
